communities.title: The Bajrang Dal's Communal Agenda

The Bajrang Dal is closely affiliated with larger Hindu nationalist organizations, such as the Vishva Hindu Parishad (VHP) and the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS), suggesting that its actions and ideology are aligned with the broader Hindu nationalist movement in the country.
